mapper.insert: insert into dish_type ( name, shop_id, create_time ) values ( #{name}, #{shopId}, #{createTime} )
insert into dish ( name, price, introduction, remark, photo_url, type_id, create_time ) values ( #{name}, #{price}, #{introduction}, #{remark}, #{photoUrl}, #{typeId}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from dish_type where shop_id = #{shopId} and name=#{name}
select count(*) from dish where name=#{name}
mapper.update: update dish set name = #{name}, price = #{price}, introduction = #{introduction}, remark = #{remark}, photo_url = #{photoUrl}, type_id = #{typeId}, create_time = #{createTime} where id = #{id}
